channel.title: Question about my npcs

item.title: Question about my npcs
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Maybe you added it in the wrong place in npchandler. try to find similar peices of codes, and paste after ending bracket of that particular code. Also the compilers that are you just compile, then you have to click runserver.bat, are by far the worse compilers i’ve ever seen. They do not detect all errors, so that might also be the problem. You compile, “no errors”, then you run the server nothing happens. There has to be NO errors for the files to compile successfully.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about my npcs
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

I have a question about my npcs
ok I add this in my autonspawn.cfg(No spaces only tab)

spawn = 251 3012 3361 0 0 0 0 0 1 King Arthur spawn = 251 3013 3361 0 0 0 0 0 1 King Arthur
And this in my NpcHandler.java for them t otalk I want him to say “Welcome to Mupescape v2!”

(npcs[i].npcType == 251) { if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to Mupescape v2!"; } }
When I add this code I compile, close the folder and open the folder run server they do nothing buy just stand there What am I doing wrong?? Help will be appreciated[br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2007, 03:57:03 PM[/size][hr]The NpcHandler code is how it came out in NPCHandler[br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2007, 04:03:18 PM[/size][hr]Sorry to triple post but can someone please help me??

Read full topic
